Its mechanism activation involve augmentation eye 's natural uveoscleral outflow capacity . There evidence ocular blood flow play role clinical course glaucoma . Glaucoma medication lower IOP simultaneously increase ocular blood perfusion pressure , turn may increase ocular blood flow . This could well contribute partially contradict result concern ocular hemodynamic effect latanoprost . In vitro study indicate latanoprost effect ocular vascular tone therapeutical dos . By contrast , report several study latanoprost 0.005 % increase pulsatile ocular blood flow patient primary open angle glaucoma normal tension glaucoma . This increase pulsatile ocular blood flow mainly reflect increase choroidal circulation . Little known potential effect latanoprost choroidal blood flow regulation human . The present study therefore try elucidate whether treatment latanoprost may alter choroidal blood flow regulation artificial change ocular perfusion pressure . In addition , present study aim clarify whether change choroidal blood flow latanoprost administration due direct vasoactive effect due increase ocular perfusion pressure . The second alternative may important implication understand glaucoma treatment , reduction IOP may per se result normalization ocular blood flow regulation .
